The aim of our plug â€” Itâ€™s like advert ğŸ™‚

If a user makes a random error and moves to the page that does not exist,very often he/she will see a page with a sad smile. Is it interesting? Of course,itâ€™s not.

If a user makes an occasional transition, would he like a sad smile on page 404? No, he wouldnâ€™t.

If a user is bored, are there any ways to interest him? Oh,no.

We offer one answer Â«YesÂ» to all these questions. We offer a free plug â€” Book of Changes.

The aim of our plugin

Do you like or dislike our ad text ğŸ™‚ We are waiting for your comments ğŸ™‚

In fact, it was a joke ğŸ™‚ We do not promote our plug-in, because it is unnecessary. What is advertising? Advertisement needs to trade for selling goods. We do not sell ? we do not need to sell plug ? itâ€™s completely free.

The aim of our plug â€” to make your site users smile, or make them ponder, or to allow them analyze some stirring events, or â€¦ There are many options. We ask you to believe , that everyone who uses this plug could find what he/she needs.

How does our plugin work

Plugin Â«404 The Book of ChangesÂ» is a selection of 8 out of the 64 points in the random number generator. Every choice is unique, each field is unique, each result is unique. The result of a choice is a small piece of text from a very ancient treatise Â«The Book of ChangesÂ».

each choice is unique not by chance:

*field changes every time you refresh the page;
*each character has a random meaning and itâ€™s hidden;
*only you can select the hidden meaning.

This approach allows you to get unique combination of 2 ^ 64 characters, which is equal to 18 446 744 073 709 551 616 points.

The aim of our plug â€” Itâ€™s like advert ğŸ™‚

If a user makes a random error and moves to the page that does not exist,very often he/she will see a page with a sad smile. Is it interesting? Of course,itâ€™s not.

If a user makes an occasional transition, would he like a sad smile on page 404? No, he wouldnâ€™t.

If a user is bored, are there any ways to interest him? Oh,no.

We offer one answer Â«YesÂ» to all these questions. We offer a free plug â€” Book of Changes.

The aim of our plugin

Do you like or dislike our ad text ğŸ™‚ We are waiting for your comments ğŸ™‚

In fact, it was a joke ğŸ™‚ We do not promote our plug-in, because it is unnecessary. What is advertising? Advertisement needs to trade for selling goods. We do not sell ? we do not need to sell plug ? itâ€™s completely free.

The aim of our plug â€” to make your site users smile, or make them ponder, or to allow them analyze some stirring events, or â€¦ There are many options. We ask you to believe , that everyone who uses this plug could find what he/she needs.

How does our plugin work

Plugin Â«404 The Book of ChangesÂ» is a selection of 8 out of the 64 points in the random number generator. Every choice is unique, each field is unique, each result is unique. The result of a choice is a small piece of text from a very ancient treatise Â«The Book of ChangesÂ».

each choice is unique not by chance:

*field changes every time you refresh the page;
*each character has a random meaning and itâ€™s hidden;
*only you can select the hidden meaning.

This approach allows you to get unique combination of 2 ^ 64 characters, which is equal to 18 446 744 073 709 551 616 points.
